name: Dandelion
description: Small customizable additions for enhancing the Geometry Dash experience.

practice-song-hack.name: Practice Song Hack
practice-song-hack.description: Uses the song of the level instead of the default practice song.

fps-overlay.name: FPS Overlay
fps-overlay.description: Displays the physics FPS at the top left corner.

player-flags.name: Player Flags
player-flags.description: Randomly adds pride flags to the icons in the chat.
